mapper.update: SELECT s250b.PRDT_CD , s250b.DCM_NO , s250b.JOB_EXCU_MBDY , s250b.REAL_MNGM_BDCD , s250b.REAL_MNGM_EMPNO , s250b.FOND_DT , s250b.KEEP_EXPR_DT , s250b.INV_EXPR_DT , s250b.FINC_CTRC_AMT , s250b.FINC_FLFL_AMT , s250b.THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT , s250b.THCO_FINC_AMT , s250b.NOW_FINC_BLCE , s250b.MNGM_PAY_BLCE , s250b.ERN_DSTR_AMT , s250b.FINC_QOTA_RT , s250b.STDR_ERN_RT , s250b.MNGM_PAY_RT , s250b.FINC_CHR_DCD , s250b.FINC_EDYC_NO , s250b.RPT_TRGT_YN , s250b.AFL_TRGT_YN , s250b.DPND_CMP_YN , s250b.DEMG_YN , s250b.DEMG_LSSD_CML_AMT , s250b.DEMG_BF_FINC_BLCE , s250b.STLA_STTM_NO , s250b.ACQ_AMT , s250b.CRRY_CD , s250b.STDR_EXRT , s250b.FRCR_FINC_BLCE , s250b.FRCR_MNGM_PAY_BLCE , s250b.CURD_DSTR_AMT , s250b.FRCR_FRS_ACQ_AMT , s250b.FRCR_FINC_CTRC_AMT , s250b.FRCR_FINC_FLFL_AMT , s250b.FRCR_THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT , s250b.FRCR_THCO_FINC_AMT , s250b.FRS_TR_DT , s250b.PRFM_PAY_BLCE , s250b.PRCR_PRFM_PAY_BLCE , s250b.HND_DETL_DTM , s250b.HND_EMPNO , s250b.HND_TMNL_NO , s250b.HND_TR_ID , s250b.GUID FROM IBIMS250B@DL_DBPKCCSH_USCS_SEL t WHERE 1=1 AND s250b.PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} AND s250b.SN = #{sn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS250B ( PRDT_CD , DCM_NO , JOB_EXCU_MBDY , REAL_MNGM_BDCD , REAL_MNGM_EMPNO , FOND_DT , KEEP_EXPR_DT , INV_EXPR_DT , FINC_CTRC_AMT , FINC_FLFL_AMT , THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT , THCO_FINC_AMT , NOW_FINC_BLCE , MNGM_PAY_BLCE , ERN_DSTR_AMT , FINC_QOTA_RT , STDR_ERN_RT , MNGM_PAY_RT , FINC_CHR_DCD , FINC_EDYC_NO , RPT_TRGT_YN , AFL_TRGT_YN , DPND_CMP_YN , DEMG_YN , DEMG_LSSD_CML_AMT , DEMG_BF_FINC_BLCE , STLA_STTM_NO , ACQ_AMT , CRRY_CD , STDR_EXRT , FRCR_FINC_BLCE , FRCR_MNGM_PAY_BLCE , CURD_DSTR_AMT , FRCR_FRS_ACQ_AMT , FRCR_FINC_CTRC_AMT , FRCR_FINC_FLFL_AMT , FRCR_THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT , FRCR_THCO_FINC_AMT , FRS_TR_DT , PRFM_PAY_BLCE , PRCR_PRFM_PAY_BLCE , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES ( IFNULL(#{prdtCd}, PRDT_CD) , IFNULL(#{dcmNo},DCM_NO) , IFNULL(#{jobExcuMbdy},JOB_EXCU_MBDY) , IFNULL(#{realMngmBdcd},REAL_MNGM_BDCD) , IFNULL(#{realMngmEmpno},REAL_MNGM_EMPNO) , IFNULL(#{fondDt},FOND_DT) , IFNULL(#{keepExprDt},KEEP_EXPR_DT) , IFNULL(#{invExprDt},INV_EXPR_DT) , IFNULL(#{fincCtrcAmt},FINC_CTRC_AMT) , IFNULL(#{fincFlflAmt},FINC_FLFL_AMT) , IFNULL(#{thcoFincCtrcAmt},THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT) , IFNULL(#{thcoFincAmt},THCO_FINC_AMT) , IFNULL(#{nowFincBlce},NOW_FINC_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{mngmPayBlce},MNGM_PAY_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{ernDstrAmt},ERN_DSTR_AMT) , IFNULL(#{fincQotaRt},FINC_QOTA_RT) , IFNULL(#{stdrErnRt},STDR_ERN_RT) , IFNULL(#{mngmPayRt},MNGM_PAY_RT) , IFNULL(#{fincChrDcd},FINC_CHR_DCD) , IFNULL(#{fincEdycNo},FINC_EDYC_NO) , IFNULL(#{rptTrgtYn},RPT_TRGT_YN) , IFNULL(#{aflTrgtYn},AFL_TRGT_YN) , IFNULL(#{dpndCmpYn},DPND_CMP_YN) , IFNULL(#{demgYn},DEMG_YN) , IFNULL(#{demgLssdCmlAmt},DEMG_LSSD_CML_AMT) , IFNULL(#{demgBfFincBlce},DEMG_BF_FINC_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{stlaSttmNo},STLA_STTM_NO) , IFNULL(#{acqAmt},ACQ_AMT) , IFNULL(#{crryCd},CRRY_CD) , IFNULL(#{stdrExrt},STDR_EXRT) , IFNULL(#{frcrFincBlce},FRCR_FINC_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{frcrMngmPayBlce},FRCR_MNGM_PAY_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{curdDstrAmt},CURD_DSTR_AMT) , IFNULL(#{frcrFrsAcqAmt},FRCR_FRS_ACQ_AMT) , IFNULL(#{frcrFincCtrcAmt},FRCR_FINC_CTRC_AMT) , IFNULL(#{frcrFincFlflAmt},FRCR_FINC_FLFL_AMT) , IFNULL(#{frcrThcoFincCtrcAmt},FRCR_THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT) , IFNULL(#{frcrThcoFincAmt},FRCR_THCO_FINC_AMT) , IFNULL(#{frsTrDt},FRS_TR_DT) , IFNULL(#{prfmPayBlce},PRFM_PAY_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{prcrPrfmPayBlce},PRCR_PRFM_PAY_BLCE) , IFNULL(#{hndDetlDtm},HND_DETL_DTM) , IFNULL(#{hndEmpno},HND_EMPNO) , IFNULL(#{hndTmnlNo},HND_TMNL_NO) , IFNULL(#{hndTrId},HND_TR_ID) , IFNULL(#{guid},GUID) ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DCM_NO = IFNULL(#{dcmNo},DCM_NO) ,JOB_EXCU_MBDY = IFNULL(#{jobExcuMbdy},JOB_EXCU_MBDY) ,REAL_MNGM_BDCD = IFNULL(#{realMngmBdcd},REAL_MNGM_BDCD) ,REAL_MNGM_EMPNO = IFNULL(#{realMngmEmpno},REAL_MNGM_EMPNO) ,FOND_DT = IFNULL(#{fondDt},FOND_DT) ,KEEP_EXPR_DT = IFNULL(#{keepExprDt},KEEP_EXPR_DT) ,INV_EXPR_DT = IFNULL(#{invExprDt},INV_EXPR_DT) ,FINC_CTRC_AMT = IFNULL(#{fincCtrcAmt},FINC_CTRC_AMT) ,FINC_FLFL_AMT = IFNULL(#{fincFlflAmt},FINC_FLFL_AMT) ,THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT = IFNULL(#{thcoFincCtrcAmt},THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT) ,THCO_FINC_AMT = IFNULL(#{thcoFincAmt},THCO_FINC_AMT) ,NOW_FINC_BLCE = IFNULL(#{nowFincBlce},NOW_FINC_BLCE) ,MNGM_PAY_BLCE = IFNULL(#{mngmPayBlce},MNGM_PAY_BLCE) ,ERN_DSTR_AMT = IFNULL(#{ernDstrAmt},ERN_DSTR_AMT) ,FINC_QOTA_RT = IFNULL(#{fincQotaRt},FINC_QOTA_RT) ,STDR_ERN_RT = IFNULL(#{stdrErnRt},STDR_ERN_RT) ,MNGM_PAY_RT = IFNULL(#{mngmPayRt},MNGM_PAY_RT) ,FINC_CHR_DCD = IFNULL(#{fincChrDcd},FINC_CHR_DCD) ,FINC_EDYC_NO = IFNULL(#{fincEdycNo},FINC_EDYC_NO) ,RPT_TRGT_YN = IFNULL(#{rptTrgtYn},RPT_TRGT_YN) ,AFL_TRGT_YN = IFNULL(#{aflTrgtYn},AFL_TRGT_YN) ,DPND_CMP_YN = IFNULL(#{dpndCmpYn},DPND_CMP_YN) ,DEMG_YN = IFNULL(#{demgYn},DEMG_YN) ,DEMG_LSSD_CML_AMT = IFNULL(#{demgLssdCmlAmt},DEMG_LSSD_CML_AMT) ,DEMG_BF_FINC_BLCE = IFNULL(#{demgBfFincBlce},DEMG_BF_FINC_BLCE) ,STLA_STTM_NO = IFNULL(#{stlaSttmNo},STLA_STTM_NO) ,ACQ_AMT = IFNULL(#{acqAmt},ACQ_AMT) ,CRRY_CD = IFNULL(#{crryCd},CRRY_CD) ,STDR_EXRT = IFNULL(#{stdrExrt},STDR_EXRT) ,FRCR_FINC_BLCE = IFNULL(#{frcrFincBlce},FRCR_FINC_BLCE) ,FRCR_MNGM_PAY_BLCE = IFNULL(#{frcrMngmPayBlce},FRCR_MNGM_PAY_BLCE) ,CURD_DSTR_AMT = IFNULL(#{curdDstrAmt},CURD_DSTR_AMT) ,FRCR_FRS_ACQ_AMT = IFNULL(#{frcrFrsAcqAmt},FRCR_FRS_ACQ_AMT) ,FRCR_FINC_CTRC_AMT = IFNULL(#{frcrFincCtrcAmt},FRCR_FINC_CTRC_AMT) ,FRCR_FINC_FLFL_AMT = IFNULL(#{frcrFincFlflAmt},FRCR_FINC_FLFL_AMT) ,FRCR_THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT = IFNULL(#{frcrThcoFincCtrcAmt},FRCR_THCO_FINC_CTRC_AMT) ,FRCR_THCO_FINC_AMT = IFNULL(#{frcrThcoFincAmt},FRCR_THCO_FINC_AMT) ,FRS_TR_DT = IFNULL(#{frsTrDt},FRS_TR_DT) ,PRFM_PAY_BLCE = IFNULL(#{prfmPayBlce},PRFM_PAY_BLCE) ,PRCR_PRFM_PAY_BLCE = IFNULL(#{prcrPrfmPayBlce},PRCR_PRFM_PAY_BLCE) ,HND_DETL_DTM = IFNULL(#{hndDetlDtm},HND_DETL_DTM) ,HND_EMPNO = IFNULL(#{hndEmpno},HND_EMPNO) ,HND_TMNL_NO = IFNULL(#{hndTmnlNo},HND_TMNL_NO) ,HND_TR_ID = IFNULL(#{hndTrId},HND_TR_ID) ,GUID = IFNULL(#{guid},GUID)
